title: Every water closet and/or a set of urinals shall have a flushing cistern of adequate capacity attached to it
clause_text: Every water closet and/or a set of urinals shall have a flushing cistern of adequate capacity attached to it.(g) All the sewerage outlets shall be connected to the municipal sewerage system. Where no such system
